content.title: Apr, 11th - ALCSI talk by Ali Babar
content.description: Our team leader, Prof Ali Babar, sharing his experience

content.title: Apr, 11th - ALCSI talk by Nguyen Khoi Tran
content.description: In Australasian Lab for Cyber Security Ideas (ALCSI 2024). Dr. Nguyen Khoi Tran from our team, who will introduce our recent research on adopting blockchain for software supply chain metadata management. In this talk, we will present our work towards a reference architecture for software supply chain metadata management (SCM2). This architecture comprises a domain model and an architectural blueprint for SCM2 systems, constructed from the concepts and building blocks scattered across existing SSC (Software Supply Chain) security frameworks and standards.

content.title: Apr, 8th - CMS Industry Engagement Day
content.description: Excited to share that CMS Industry Engagement Day, hosted by the School of Computer and Mathematical Sciences, University of Adelaide, is underway! It offers academic staff a chance to delve into industry engagement activities, with school representatives and industry partners sharing their collaborative experiences. Today, our team leader, Prof Ali Babar, presents 'Industry Engagements - Kissing the Right Frog,' drawing from his extensive experience in industry collaboration and funding. A fantastic opportunity for learning and strategizing!

content.title: Apr, 8th - Guest talk by Dr. Dhani Dharmaprani
content.description: We were honored to host Dr. Dhani Dharmaprani for an insightful discussion on 'Cardiovascular Health with Digital Twin' at CREST.

content.title: Mar, 4th - Guest talk by Professor Asif Gill
content.description: CREST had the pleasure of hosting Professor Asif Gill for an insightful session on 'Adaptive and Secure Data Architecture for AI/GAI adoption in the public sector'.

content.title: Dec, 15th - CREST End-of-the-year gathering event
content.description: CREST End-of-the-year gathering event. We shared our outcomes of the year and celerated with foods and drinks!

content.title: Oct, 16th - Guest talk by Bach Le from University of Melbourne
content.description: We had an enlightening guest talk today, presented by Dr. Bach Le from University of Melbourne, where he shared his research on human-centered & data-driven. CREST members also engaged in discussions on common research interests, paving the way for potential collaboration.

content.title: Jul, 4th - Our PhD student SZ Mousavi is presenting our review on 'Detecting misuses of security APIs at CSCRC symposium'
content.description: Our PhD student SZ Mousavi is presenting our review on detecting misuses of security APIs at CSCRC symposium.

content.title: May, 17th - CREST team at ICSE2023
content.description: If you're interested in Software Security, Vulnerability Analytics, Data Quality for SE, let's talk to us and explore potential collaboration opportunities.

content.title: May, 10th - Guest talk by Prof. Amin Beheshti
content.description: CREST was delighted to host prof Amin Beheshti from Macquarie University; heard insightful talk on generative AI, it's applications to real world projects of his team. thx 4 visiting & sharing fascinating ideas; favourite one is data-driven story telling & graph summarization
